alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 10:32AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Potentially strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Cattaraugus, southern Erie and east central Chautauqua Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1031 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy showers and potentially strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Fredonia to near Lakewood. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamburg, East Aurora, Salamanca, Evans, Boston, Eden, Springville, Colden, Orchard Park, Gowanda, Ashford, Angola, North Collins, Ashford Hollow, Derby, East Concord, Wales Center, Angola on the Lake, North Boston and Billington Heights. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 57A and 57. Interstate 86 between exits 15 and 17, and near exit 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
